Name: Dead By Murder
About the game: “Dead By Murder”, is a murder mystery strategy game, where the user plays as a police detective and must solve a series of homicide cases. The game has the look and feel of a black and white comic book. It is set in Los Angeles in 1945 and all the characters have the faces of Golden Age Hollywood stars. Features: - Easy and fast paced gameplay. - Unique game mechanics. - Many original cases to solve. - New cases can be added at anytime. - A tribute to the old Hollywood gangster movies.
